reviews.text: I liked it but i couldnt pick out the yeast strain.  It seemed like they used a German hefeweizen.  It was good in small doses.  ---Rated via Beer Buddy for Android
Bottle.   Deep amber color. Creamy white head. Slight aroma of caramel malts. Flavor is of malt with slight hop finish, but very thin. Mouthfeel is pleasant. I enjoyed this beer.

From bottle. Chestnut brown with a fizzy head that went quickly. Mild aroma is toasty and nutty with a very deep sweetness that I surprising liked a lot (I usually donât enjoy sweetness in my beer). Flavors of roasty nuttiness, and a bit of toffee. More floraly sweetness in the flavor.
